Class InputManager

  com.brackeen.javagamebook.input.InputManager

extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener

Method Detail

setCursor

public void setCursor(java.awt.Cursor cursor)
Method setCursor Sets the cursor on this InputManager's input component.

Parameters:
cursor - is a Cursor

setRelativeMouseMode

public void setRelativeMouseMode(boolean mode)
Method setRelativeMouseMode Sets whether realtive mouse mode is on or not. For relative mouse mode, the mouse is "locked" in the center of the screen, and only the changed in mouse movement is measured. In normal mode, the mouse is free to move about the screen.

Parameters:
mode - is a boolean value

isRelativeMouseMode

public boolean isRelativeMouseMode()
Method isRelativeMouseMode Returns whether or not relative mouse mode is on.

Returns:
a boolean that is true if the robot is not null, and false if it is

mapToKey

public void mapToKey(com.brackeen.javagamebook.input.GameAction gameAction,
                     int keyCode)
Method mapToKey Maps a GameAction to a specific key. The key codes are defined in java.awt.KeyEvent. If the key already has a GameAction mapped to it, the new GameAction overwrites it.

Parameters:
gameAction - is the GameAction object
keyCode - is an Integer value
See Also:
KeyEvent

mapToMouse

public void mapToMouse(com.brackeen.javagamebook.input.GameAction gameAction,
                       int mouseCode)
Method mapToMouse Maps a GameAction to a specific mouse action. The mouse codes are defined herer in InputManager (MOUSE_MOVE_LEFT, MOUSE_BUTTON_1, etc). If the mouse action already has a GameAction mapped to it, the new GameAction overwrites it.

Parameters:
gameAction - is the GameAction object
mouseCode - is an Integer value

clearMap

public void clearMap(com.brackeen.javagamebook.input.GameAction gameAction)
Method clearMap Clears all mapped keys and mouse actions to this GameAction.

Parameters:
gameAction - is the GameAction that is going to be cleared from the map

getMaps

public java.util.List getMaps(com.brackeen.javagamebook.input.GameAction gameCode)
Method getMaps Gets a List of names of the keys and mouse actions mapped to this GameAction. Each entry in the List is a String.

Parameters:
gameCode - is the GameAction
Returns:
a List of the names of the keys and mouse actions mapped to the GameAction

resetAllGameActions

public void resetAllGameActions()
Method resetAllGameActions Resets all GameActions so they appear like they haven't been pressed.

Returns:
an Integer value with the y position of the mouse

recenterMouse

private void recenterMouse()
Method recenterMouse Uses the Robot class to try to postion the mouse in the center of the screen.

Note that use of the Robot class may not be available on all platforms.
